p:
Eq. ( 5) was used to calculate the sugar consumption rate (R S) (g.L − 1.h − 1):
5
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {\mathrm{R}}_{\mathrm{S}}=\Delta \mathrm{S}/\varDelta \mathrm{t} $$\end{document}
R S
= ΔS / Δ t
